ftbquests.chapter.digital.title: Digital[--数字--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests0.descri: &eApplied Energistics 2&r will need &bCertus Quartz&r and lots of &bPrinted Silicon Circuits&r to start.[--&e应用能源2&r需要&b赛特斯石英&r和大量的&b硅电路&r才能开始.--]

Unfortunately, it's not simple. Certus isn't too bad, just &6sift Dust through a Mana Mesh&r, but the printed circuits will take you on a journey through several processing steps to arrive at the final product as outlined in chapter 3.[--很不幸,它不是那么简单。赛特斯并不坏,只是&6筛网&r通过&6筛粉&r,但是,印记电路会通过几个处理步骤让你通过一个旅程来达到第3章概述的终极产物.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests1.descri: &6Certus Quartz Dust&r can be converted to &bCertus Quartz Crystal&r in a &eCrystallizer&r or later on, in &eMekanism&r's &6Enriching Chamber&r.[--&6赛特斯石英粉&r可以在&e水晶&r或之后在&e通用机械&r的&6富集仓&r中转换为&b赛特斯石英水晶&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests2.descri: It might be a good idea to craft &bCharged Certus Quartz&r into some &6Budding Certus Quartz&r, to get a renewable source![--将&b充能赛特斯石英&r制作成一些&6赛特斯石英&r以获得一个再生资源,可能是一个好主意!--]
You'll need to first energize them however, which will require a Powah Energizing orb.[--然而,你需要首先激活它们,这将需要一个Powah Energized orb.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests3.descri: &bFluix Crystals&r can be created expensively in the dissolution chamber at first, and later more efficiently once you've unlocked the Quantum Assembler.[--&b福鲁伊克斯水晶&r可以先在溶解室中以昂贵的方式制作,然后在解锁量子组装器后更高效地制作.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests4.descri: &bME Cables&r connect all the devices on your &eAE2&r network.[--&bME线缆&r连接了&eAE2&r网络上的所有设备.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests5.title: Applied Energistics 2[--应用能源2--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests5.subtit: It's got a fancy Ponder![--它有一个花哨的粉末!--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests5.descri: While you can technically have a small network using only an &bEnergy Accepter&r, an &bME Controller&r is definitely recommended.[--虽然从技术上讲,你只能使用&b能源接收器&r有一个小型网络,但确实建议使用&bME控制器&r.--]
We've included a &6Ponder&r to show how they work![--我们包含一个&6Pownder&r来展示它们如何工作!--]
To craft this you'll need to miniaturize a small contruct, the blue print can be found in your schematic table[--要制作这个,你需要将一个小型共鸣器微型化,蓝图桌中可以找到蓝色的印记--]
for the schematic cannon.[--用于蓝图加农炮。--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests6.descri: The &bModular Storage&r block is used to store items. Depending on the &bStorage Module&r installed, it can hold up to 300 stacks.[--&b模块存储&r用于存储物品。取决于安装的&b存储模块&r,它可以容纳多达300组物品.--]

Install a Storage Module by inserting it into the &6top left slot on the bottom left&r, then click the L button to lock it. If removed, &6the items will stay in the Storage Module&r item, not the block.[--安装存储模块,将其插入左下方的&6左上方插槽&r,然后单击L按钮来锁定它。如果移除,&6物品将保留在存储模块&r物品中,而不是方块中.--]
Above the crafting grid, you can &6store up to 6 recipes&r. Double-clicking a stored recipe will fill the grid instantly.[--在合成网格上方,您可以&6存储最多6个配方&r.双击存储的配方会立即填充该配方.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests7.descri: While you access items at the &6Modular Storage&r, the items are actually stored in &bStorage Modules&r.[--当你在&6模块存储&r访问物品时,这些物品实际存储在&b存储模块&r中.--]
The Tier 1 Storage Module can hold 100 stacks.[--1级存储模块可以容纳100组物品.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests8.descri: The Tier 2 Storage Module can hold 200 stacks.[--2级存储模块可以容纳200组物品.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests9.descri: The Tier 3 Storage Module can hold 300 stacks.[--3级存储模块可以容纳300组物品.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests10.descr: The Tier 4 Storage Module can hold 500 stacks.[--4级存储模块可以容纳500组物品.--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests11.descr: Mekanism Quantum Item Orchestration is a powerful mass storage solution that is available to you as soon as you are able to make basic circuits. The drive array is more expense and you wont be able to make more until later but you're given one here as a quest reward. Each drive array can hold up to 12 storage drives. [--Mekanism 量子管管是一种强大的大型存储解决方案,一旦你能够制作基础电路,你就可以使用。驱动器阵列会增加成本,直到以后你才能产生更多,但你在这里获得一个任务奖励。每个驱动器阵列最多可以容纳12个存储驱动器。--]
This system can tie into most other storage system logistics as well such as AE2, Functional Storage and Integrated Dynamics.[--这个系统可以连接到大多数其他存储系统物流,例如AE2,功能存储和集成动态。--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests18.subti: Applied Energistic... finally[--应用能源...最终--]
ftbquests.chapter.digital.quests19.descr: Using the &bCrystalizer&r, various Dusts can be processed back into their original form. [--使用&b水晶机&r,各种尘土可以重新加工为原版.--]
Be sure to check JEI for the possibilities.[--一定要检查JEI的几率.--]
